title: 1337speak
content:

[url=http://stephenfunsite.50webs.com/extras/1337/index.html]I found this exelent website! It translates normal text into leetspeak![/url]

Cool find, eh?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] Signed, Harvey Smith

title: f4cl
content: I consider l33t highly annoying. Besides, you get the better result when thinking everything by yourself when writing the text -- this program gives always the same result with the same input (which is NOT good in this case), and doesn't notice to make things like "you" into "j00", for example..Eat your veggies!

title: 1ch 157 teh 1337 s14xx0r!
content:
O...m...g... a n00b p0rg for a n00b language. 364d m4n! n00b^2!

*sigh*

Or, as this program butchers my phrase into:

[hr]un1337 "O...M...G... A NOOB PROGRAM FOR A NOOB LANGUAGE! EGAD MAN. NOOB^2!" is 0000(\/)(\/)(\/)(\/)6666 4 (\)008 |*|206|24(\/) F0|2 4 (\)008 |_4(\)6(_)4633 364|) (\/)4(\)(\) (\)008888 in 13375|*34|{.
[hr]

*shudder* Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: 1ch 157 teh 1337 s14xx0r!
content:
Wht need 1337? I can make myself un-understandable [standable?] easily enough:

Hee! Niemand kann mich jetzt verstehen! Es sei denn sie Deutsches sprechen!


Or:

ZOMG! Me no snese liek Harvey Whee! Zibble post nacht!


A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

-Levellord
